parametre.sourceSQL: SELECT id,nom || ' (Du ' || to_char(activation,'dd/MM/YYYY à HH24:MI') || ' au ' || to_char(cloture,'dd/MM/YYYY à HH24:MI') || ')' AS libelle FROM remocra.crise ORDER BY cloture DESC
